channel.title: Eventmanager - Player Logged out durning an event <caught>
channel.description:
[b]Does anyone know why the server keeps getting disconneted offline after using funpk or pk it goes offline after a couple of players start to pk come up with eventmanager in the cmd
Eventmanager - Player Logged out durning an event <caught>

item.title: Eventmanager - Player Logged out durning an event <caught>
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:7, topic:538743”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=657574.msg4399023#msg4399023 date=1390061708]
stop using the eventmanager its outdated and pretty much sucks now, also there’s a big thread safety concern with it as proper synchronization wasn’t applied when graham made it (because its so outdated!)
[/quote]

how do i stop using the eventmanager???[/quote]Un-implement it, and implement a cycle based task manager… :=)

Read full topic

Post the error please, and if it the errors mention any line of any file make sure to post that file aswell, and please, dont do this

then it went offline its like a restarter is there a file i can edit the time of running to the server?
